translation: Do not yield to impotence, O Arjuna, son of Pritha. It does not befit you. Cast off this mean weakness of the heart! Stand up, O conqueror of foes!
commentary: 2.3 Clabym impotence? Ma sma gamaá¸¥ do not get? Partha O Partha? Not not? This this? in you in thee? Uppadyate is fitting? petty mean? heart weakness weakness of the heart? Leaving having abandoned? Get up stand up? Parantapa O scorcher of the foes.No commentary.
